name: Super Street Fighter 2 Turbo
description:
Super Street Fighter 2 Turbo is an arcade-fighting game developed by Capcom and Eurocom Entertainment Software. It was originally released in 1995. It was published by GameTek. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Super Street Fighter 2 Turbo on PC and 3DO.
Isao Abe and Syun Nishigaki scored the game.
